body_html:
Hej Maud 👋

You moved the status_updates#show to the ActivitiesController. I would leave it where it is – it isolates the commenting feature to just activities of kind status_update, otherwise it interferes with feed entries.

The status_updates/show template can hold all the comment code. You can look at projects/show for inspiration (with the exception that we cannot lock comments for status updates … yet).

The problems with PATH_PARENTS / redirection: I'm thinking it tries to redirect to the activities_controller, right? In that case: we probably need a special comments controller that defines PATH_PARENTS differently but ideally, we can get around that.

@michaelem, do you have a hint on how to deal with PATH_PARENTS and/or the CommentsController subclassing here?
